resp:

3. Determine whether John Wall lead both team in assists for the game on November 6th. Since John Wall's assists of 10 on November 6th are higher than any other assist value in the games played by Philadelphia up until that date, it can be concluded that he did indeed lead both team in assists for the game on November 6th.
